alert.note: Alert for Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 11:34AM MST until December 05 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches from Seeley Lake to Condon, with 8 to 14 inches across the Mission and Swan Mountains. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches for the Highway 200 and I-90 corridors. * WHERE...Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, and I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 PM MST this afternoon. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
